_description: A verse inscription from Shrewsbury recording the burial of the father and mother of three saints — four unrhymed lines

Lam499.Transcription:
Her lis arfaxat fader brandanant kolmkilne ant cowhel þer
                    haleweant dame coroune moder þeyre haleweþat komen in to
                    bretene sautes to seke
Lam499.Attributed Title:
Hec scripta inueniebantur super quoddam vas plumbeum exterius sub
                        fundamento operis capelle beate virginis Salobebire (f. 69)
Lam499.Editions:
Pickering,   Oliver S. 
             “An Early Middle English Verse Inscription from Shrewsbury.” 
             Anglia
         106 (1988): 411-14: 412.
